profiles:
Summary Senior Network Consulting engineer with 11+ years of experience in Network solution design validation, optimization and network operations. Currently working in Solution Validation Services (formerly WW service provider) group responsible for solution validation and migration projects for Tier-1 service provider customers. 
 
Business Operations: Collaboration, scoping & definition, project management & delivery planning, relationship building & consulting. 
 
Services Delivery: Service provider architecture design, next generation network (NGN) solution, quality control, ISO / regulatory compliance, network solution testing, High Level / Low Level design creation, Large Scale Network Migration, training delivery & talent acquisition. 
 
Optimization: Network Audits, design optimization, Software Strategy, anticipate change, addressing adhoc customer requests. 
 
Technical Expertise: CCIE#21539 (Routing & Switching, Service Provider), CCIE Datacenter( written), JNCIS Service Provider certified. Experience on devices from multiple Cisco products with excellent platform knowledge of Cisco ASR1k, ASR9k, 7200, 6500, Nexus switches and CRS. Attended Vmware (VCP5-DCV) training.  
 
Specialties: SP Architecture, Network Virtualization, Routing & Switching, Test tools ( Ixia, Spirent, Agilent), Project Management, Collaboration, ITILv3 certified. Experience Senior Network Consulting Engineer (Network Consulting Engineer - WW Service Provider Group) Cisco Systems August 2009  – Present (6 years 1 month) Pune Area, India  Writing HLD/LLD for large Enterprise and Service Provider Customers. 
	BT VPN EDGE Project: Closely working with BT(Customer) as lead engineer for Design validation and integration testing for BT Global and BT UK MPLS network to help migrate current end of life routers to Cisco ASR1k routers acting as PE/P/RR/Cloud routers. Major features validated MPLS-VPN, BGP, LNS PE, QOS, BFD, MVPN, EzVPN, Flex VPN, multicast extranet, ELINE, ELAN, various access types (DSL, Ethernet, SONET, POS), Fast Convergence.  
	Swisscom IOS release migration: Lead project as Tech lead to support Swisscom migrate their 7200 PE routers from 12.3(18) to 15.1(3)S1. Preparation of Test scope, Design LAB topology, Test plan, MOP for Migration. Perform test execution and provide support during migration window. Features included Qos (managing behavior change from pre to post HQF release), MPLS VPN, Multicast VPN, ISIS, ATM QOS, LFIoMLPoATM. 
	Deutsch Telecom Project: Qualify ASK9k running 4.0.1 in accordance to DT’s access aggregation network solution. Features covered in testing as per design requirements including VLAN acrobatics, ISIS, MPLS L2VPN, E-OAM, ANCP, QOS, IGMP snooping, MCLAG DAI, and IPSG. 
	BT 21C: Project involved validation of the BT21C Core design comprising of CRS-1 devices as PE and P routers. Activities involved building test plan and perform conformance, performance and system stability testing of CRS-1 as P/PE router. Features and protocols involved in testing: SDR, BGP, OSPF, MPLS-VPN, system convergence, QOS, VRRP, scalability, BFD. 
 Network Consulting Engineer - NOS-GSP (Network Optimization- Global Services Practices) Cisco Systems January 2007  –  July 2009  (2 years 7 months) Bangalore, India 	Lead the GSP NOS team as SPOC(Single point of contact) for Telecom Italia (SP-Italy) account team. Showcased as success story in GSP with appreciation received at VP level for successfully delivering various ad-hoc requests. 
	Resolve highly complex problems and compatibility issues. 
	Activities we covered for customer: IOS to XR configuration translation, feasibility studies for Ten Gigabit Etherchannel on CRS-1 and 6500, Impact analysis of copp/ pim-filter etc on c10000, multiple priority feature on c10000, OIR procedure document on c10000, BGP scalability recommendation on GSR/7200, Network Audit for various platforms including High End routers. 
	Contributions in HLD documentations. 
	Consulting solutions (feasibility Study, Impact analysis, Design reviews, Risk Analysis, PE&O) needs to be provided to the customer. 
	Challenging work environment that requires competence in wide array or technologies (Routing/Switching/Service provider) and platforms (Cisco High End platforms c10000, CRS-1, GSR, 7600/6500 etc). 
	Closely collaborate with Account and Engineering teams globally. 
	Delivery of Advanced Services programs to major accounts. Provide consultative support in optimization/operation of networks. 
 Network Engineer Perot Systems 2006  –  2006  (less than a year) 	Instrumental in maintaining and providing support for all the network related operations for both Perot Systems and over 45 Perot’s client in US. 
	Successfully managing  
o	Network related issues for Command center, Proactive approach for minimal network downtime as per SLA’s. 
o	Monitoring wide array of WAN circuits including Frame-Relay, ATM, Serial and DSL links worldwide running on static and dynamic. 
	Effectively troubleshooting Routing protocols like EIGRP, OSPF, and BGP and involving over 3000 Cisco Routers. 
	Played a pivotal role in  
o	Monitoring trouble tickets in AR systems-Remedy and other networks tools like SMARTS, Voyence. 
o	Managing LAN Networks associated with Layer2 and Layer3 Switches. 
o	Configuration and troubleshooting VLAN. 
	Co-coordinating with Telecommunication providers like ATT, Verizon, MCI, SBC etc for rectifying network outages. 
	Rated as best performer in team. 
 Network Engineer Cable & Wireless - India 2004  –  2005  (1 year) 	Was responsible for  
o	Maintaining LAN infrastructure including routers (3745, 7206), switches (3550, 6509), IP Phones (7940), WAN connectivity and Cisco IP contact center infrastructure in a 24X7 support environment. 
o	Installation, configuration & administration of Routers, Switches. Troubleshooting hardware and software related problems in network devices. 
o	Managing and configuration of VLANs, voice VLANs, interVLAN routing, implementing HSRP, STP, TACACS+. 
o	Vendor management for network equipments, IPLC (E1) commissioning and monitoring. 
	Handled the network and monitored the same using tools like Netwatch and Network Analyzers. 
 Customer Support Engineer ITSource Outsourced to Wipro Infotech - Client - PriceWaterHouse Coopers August 2004  –  October 2004  (3 months) Mumbai Area, India 	Handled operations like maintaining WAN links & equipments like Cisco 1700 router. Co-ordinate with Lease Line service providers in cases of Lease Line Failure. 
	Operations included; 
	Testing Weekly, Auto Trigger ISDN functionality. 
	Installation & Troubleshooting LAN equipment like HUB’s & Switches. 
	VLAN management, managing dial up access of Users. 
	Installation, configuration and Administration of Windows NT server on branded server hardware. 
	This includes addition / deletion of users & groups, file / directory permissions for file & Print Servers. 
	Managing Daily data backup, scheduling additional backup / restore. 
	Managing Lotus Domino Server & Clients which includes 
	Creation / Deletion of Lotus Notes ids for users. 
	Troubleshooting issues related to Lotus. 
	Laptop Vendor management for managing issues related to Laptop hardware. 
 Trainee Engineer CMS Computers January 2004  –  August 2004  (8 months) Mumbai Area, India 	Initially worked as Field Engineer for about a month to resolve various IT Installation and issues raised by clients of CMS computers in Mumbai. 
	Install New Desktop machines at various Client sites. 
	Troubleshoot any issues related Windows OS like WinXP. 
	Troubleshoot issues related to printers and connectivity.  
	Worked as facility management engineer at Client Site - Shipping Corporation of India. 
	Working as part of onsite team to manage daily operations related to Desktop and network issues. 
	Resolving Issues as assigned by helpdesk within required SLA. 
	Coordinate with Lease Line service providers in cases of Lease Line Failure. Provide Loop to WAN link to check Link Errors. 
	Trouble shoot cabling faults related issues with LAN switches, hubs, network printers, Desktops. 
	Setup and Troubleshoot issues related to Windows platforms: -Win95, 98, XP, 2k and client Software’s: - Lotus Notes Client R5, McAfee Antivirus, MS office. 
	Resolved issues related to Laserjet and Deskjet.

Summary A network consultant with 14 years expertise working on highly resilient core networks for service providers and mobile operators. Detailed knowledge of networks running MPLS/VPN using BGP, ISIS, and OSPF using full spectrum of Cisco core routers: CRS, ASR9000, 12000, and the complete range of edge routers. Responsible for tuning of core networks to provide convergence times of less than 50ms using MPLS Traffic Engineering (TE) and Fast Re-Route (FRR), or IP-Loop-Free Alternative (LFA) along with tuning of edge/enterprise to converge in less that 1 second to minimise impact to traffic carrying voice/critical traffic. In-depth knowledge of QoS on a range of different platforms using: MDRR, WDRR, CBWFQ and LLQ including tuning of WRED for complex customer QoS strategies to support VoIP and other business critical services.  
Works methodically and independently to achieve objectives/dead lines. Systematic, precise thinker able to follow procedures in a patient, deliberate manner; painstaking in both setting and maintaining standards. Enjoys challenging assignments calling for penetrating analysis in a technical/specialist oriented area. Able to work as a member of a team and with a flexible approach enabling use of own initiative. 
 
Specialties: CCIE #5346 - Nov. 1999
